content.name: html_3
content.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
</head>

<style>

/* NHS Colours */
.danger {
  background-color: #f2dede;
  color: #a94442;
}
.jmuiHeader {
  display: none !important;
}
.jmuiLayout {
  display: none !important;
}
.jmuiPageScroller {
  padding: 0 !important;
}
div.activity {
  display: none !important;
}

/*************************************
            APP TITLE BAR
*************************************/
app-header-bar {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  margin: auto;
  text-align: center;
  background: #0072c6;
  padding: 40px 0 40px 0;
  font-family: 'OpenSans' sans-serif;
  color: white;
  font-size: 24px;
}
dashboard-page app-header-bar {
  padding: 12px 0 12px 0;
}
/*************************************
            DASHBOARD ENTRIES
*************************************/
dashboard-entry-date {
  padding: 15px 0px;
  font-size: 13px;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #0072c6;
}
dashboard-entry {
  background: white;
  width: 100%;
  border-top: 1px solid #ccc;
  display: flex;
}
dashboard-entry-title {
  padding: 0 10px;
  line-height: 54px;
}
dashboard-entry-help {
  color: #ccc;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 54px;
  float: right;
  padding-right: 5px;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
}
dashboard-entry-help:hover  {
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
}
dashboard-entry-value {
    padding: 7px;
    border-radius: 100%;
    color: #333;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: center;
    width: 45px;
    height: 45px;
    border: 5px solid transparent;
}
dashboard-entry-value:hover  {
  border: 5px solid #000;
}
dashboard-entry-value.level1,
dashboard-entry-value.level2 {
  background: #009e49;
  color: #fff;
}
dashboard-entry-value.level3 {
  background: #f7e214;
}
dashboard-entry-value.level4 {
  background: #e28c05;
  color: #fff;
}
dashboard-entry-value.level5 {
  background: #d81e05;
  color: #fff;
}
dashboard-entry-main {
  flex-basis: 60%;
}
dashboard-entry-icon {
	flex-basis: 16%;
    border: 1px solid #ffffff;
  	background-size: contain;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	width: 125px;
}
dashboard-entry-icon:hover {
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
}



dashboard-entry-info {
  flex-basis: 20%;
  margin-top: auto;
  margin-bottom: auto;
  display: flex;
}
dashboard-entry-value-help {
  line-height: 43px;
  padding-left: 5px;
  font-size: 12px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
}
dashboard-entry-value-help:hover  {
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
}

dashboard-entry-arrow {
  flex-basis: 6%;
  margin: auto;
  margin-right: 20px;
  height: 25px;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  border: 1px solid #ffffff;
}


dashboard-entry-arrow.arrowUp:hover  {
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
}
dashboard-entry-arrow.arrowDown:hover  {
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
}


img.iconImage {
  width: 100%;
}
img.arrowImage {
  width: 100%;
}


/*************************************
            PAGE LAYOUTS
*************************************/
div.outer {
  background-color: #efefef;
}
div.inner {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  align-items: center;
  flex-direction: column;
  margin: auto;
}
/*************************************
            START PAGE
*************************************/
/*************************************
            GENERAL STYLES
*************************************/
* [show="true"] {
  display: inherit;
}
* [show="false"] {
  display: none;
}
* [show="before"],
* [show="after"] {
  display: inherit;
}
* [show="before"]:before,
* [show="after"]:after {
  color: #fff;
}
html,
body {
  font-family: Helvetica;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: #efefef;
}
.grey {
  background-color: #333;
  color: grey;
}
.grey i {
  color: grey;
  border-color: grey;
}

  
/*************************************
            INPUTS
*************************************/  
  
  
input[type=text]  {
  font-size: 16px;
  border: 1px solid white;
  width:220px;
}

input[type=text]:hover  {
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
}

.help input[type=text] {
    font-size: 14px;
    border: 1px solid white;
    text-align: right;
    width: 80px;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 54px;
    float: right;
    padding-right: 5px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
}


input[type=number]  {
	font-size: 16px;
	font-weight: bold;
  
	width: 35px;
	height: 25px;
  
    text-align: center;
	background-color : transparent;
	color: #fff;
  
  	border: 1px solid transparent;
}

input[type=number]:hover  {
  /*border: 1px solid #ccc;*/
}

*::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    color: black;
}

.hidden {
  display: none;
}
h2 {
  font-size: 28px;
  color: #333;
  margin: 15px 0 5px;
  width: 80%;
  text-align: left;
}
p {
  font-size: 22px;
  margin: 0 0 15px;
  width: 80%;
  text-align: left;
}

</style>


<body>


<dashboard-entry id="row0">
	<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon1" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow0"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title0" placeholder="A&E Waits"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help0" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level4" id="circle0" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no0" placeholder="3"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
	<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo0">&nbsp</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
	<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowDown" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow0"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
</dashboard-entry>

<dashboard-entry id="row1">
	<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon2" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow1"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title1" placeholder="DNA Rate"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help1" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level1" id="circle1" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no1" placeholder="10"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
		<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo1">%</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
	<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowUp" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow1"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
</dashboard-entry>

<dashboard-entry id="row2">
	<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon3" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow2"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title2" placeholder="Length Of Stay"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help2" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level1" id="circle2" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no2" placeholder="5"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
		<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo2">&nbsp</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
	<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowDown" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow2"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
</dashboard-entry>


<dashboard-entry id="row3">
	<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon4" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow3"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title3" placeholder="Average Waits Updated"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help3" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level5" id="circle3" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no3" placeholder="12"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
		<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo3">&nbsp</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
	<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowUp" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow3"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
</dashboard-entry>

<dashboard-entry id="row4">
<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon5" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow4"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title4" placeholder="Bed Count"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help4" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level5" id="circle4" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no4" placeholder="15"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
		<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo4">%</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
	<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowDown" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow4"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
</dashboard-entry>

<dashboard-entry id="row5">
	<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon6" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow5"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title5" placeholder="Mortality"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help5" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level5" id="circle5" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no5" placeholder="95"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
		<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo5">&nbsp</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowUp" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow5"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
	</dashboard-entry>

<dashboard-entry id="row6">
	<dashboard-entry-icon class="icon7" onclick="mdm.toggleIcons(this)" id="iconrow6"></dashboard-entry-icon>
	<dashboard-entry-main>
		<dashboard-entry-title><input type="text" name="title6" placeholder="Theatre Utilisation"></dashboard-entry-title>
		<dashboard-entry-help class="help"><input type="text" name="help6" placeholder="xxxx"></dashboard-entry-help>
	</dashboard-entry-main>
	<dashboard-entry-info>
		<dashboard-entry-value class="level1" id="circle6" onclick="mdm.toggleLevels(this)">
			<dashboard-entry-value-text><input type="number" name="no6" placeholder="85"></dashboard-entry-value-text>
		</dashboard-entry-value>
		<dashboard-entry-value-help onclick="mdm.togglePercent(this)" id="valueinfo6">%</dashboard-entry-value-help>
	</dashboard-entry-info>
	<dashboard-entry-arrow class="arrowDown" onclick="mdm.toggleArrows(this)" id="arrow6"></dashboard-entry-arrow>
</dashboard-entry>
  
</body>

</html>

params.name: data
